alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 22 at 3:03PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by runoff from recent rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio, including the following areas, in northern Indiana, Adams, Allen IN, Blackford, Grant, Huntington, Jay and Wells. In northwest Ohio, Allen OH, Paulding, Putnam and Van Wert. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Additional rainfall amounts of one quarter of an inch or less are expected, mainly along and north of US Route 24. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Allen; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wells
